item.description:
Our January meeting will be an open discussion followed by a "Stretching for Pain Relief" demonstration by Betsy. Stretching is a crucial daily ritual to be practiced by anyone wanting less daily pain from Fibromyalgia.

Bring an exercise mat or something padded to help you stretch on the floor. If you can't get on the floor I will help you to modify the exercises so they can be done in a chair.

Last December's meeting was a good one with Cold Laser Practitioner/Accupuncturist Sung Kim presenting.

See you in January!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one running around setting up the chairs!
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia January Meetup
